NAME: Known regressions in ScummVM since 0.3.0b
DESC: This is a list of current regressions introduced since 0.3.0b (before comi work started)

ul.li:
Monkey Island:
The intro crashes if you press escape at a certain point after the lucasfilm logo. Patch 671031 tries to address this.
Loom:
Not all of the distaff is cleared from the screen after weaving open on the egg near the start of the game. See here for a screenshot.
Zak256:
Failed assetion when turning on (not using) the lighter in the case. See bug report 670942. scumm/usage_bits.cpp:42: void Scumm::setGfxUsageBit(int, int): Assertion `1 <= bit && bit <= 96' failed.
DOTT:
Actors often don't finish what they are saying. This probably affects other games as well
